job.title: Data Scientist
job.description:
KEY QUALIFICATIONS:
* BA/BS/BEng or higher degree with emphasis in electrical/network engineering, computer science, analytics, statistics, economics or equivalent degree/experience
* 4+ years of experience in data mining & analytics, working with clients and knowledge of data and insights
* 4+ years experience in RF engineering, network analytics or network planning
* Experience working with large data-sets and an understanding of statistical analysis. Fluency in SQL and scripting languages (Python preferred).
* Knowledge of telecom infrastructure network principles, coverage and capacity requirements
* Experience working on network performance and analytics for an operator or equipment vendor deploying or operating telecom networks
* Strong interpersonal skills with experience of driving action based on data-driven insights. Ability to turn vague concepts and asks into well-documented and effective business metrics and storytelling through data insights.
* Track record of operating independently, demonstrating creativity, being detail-oriented, and delivering results in a highly organized manner
* Comfort working across time zones, remote teams and cultures required
